translations.translation: This is certainly in the earlier texts,
This is surely in the earlier Books,
This, indeed, was in the ancient Scrolls,
This is what is written in the ancient heavenly Books,
Indeed this is in the former scriptures.
Verily, this is in the former Scriptures
Most surely this is in the earlier scriptures,
Surely this is in the ancient scrolls,
Lo! This is in the former scrolls.
This indeed is what is taught in the former scriptures --
Verily this is in Writs ancient
This is indeed in the former scriptures,
And this is in the Books of the earliest (Revelation),-
Verily! This is in the former Scriptures,
Surely, this is in the ancient Scrolls,
This is in the former scriptures.
Indeed, this is in the former scriptures,
[87:18] Truly this, the success of those who purify themselves, and the Hereafter being better, is in the former scrolls, the ones revealed before the Qur’ān,
Lo! This) from His saying: (He is Successful) up to here (is in the former scrolls) in the Scriptures of the people of old,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَفِي ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلأُولَىٰ } معناه في كُتبِ الله تعالى

translations.translation: And His saying, "Indeed, this is in the first {scripture}," means in the books of Allah.
